item.description:
This only meetup in Boston that brings together nonprofits and businesses to work on collaboration and partnerships in an informative and fun format. We will be having a short presentation on social media for nonprofits and how it can benefit your organization. Every month we bring one local nonprofit into the spotlight and all the donations go directly to the organization. The spotlight nonprofit will be The National Foundation for Teaching Entrepreneurship (http://www.nfte.com...) for our next meetup. Vlora has also provided a special menu for the group. We kindly ask that you purchase something to eat small or large for lunch. Look forward to seeing you there!

Agenda:

12:45-1:00pm - Networking with food and drink
1:00-2:00pm - Short introductions, monthly nonprofit spotlight presentation The National Foundation for Adoption and Foster Care Mentoring - www.afcmentoring.org, followed by a conversation on leadership.
2:00-2:15pm - More Networking and collaborating

Testimonials:
http://www.youtube.co...

“I met some great people who were willing to share ideas and thoughts. Everyone wants to help - it really is a win/win situation. ” - Danielle

“A good group of experienced professionals with diversified expertise but one thing in common: enthusiasm for social changes. Clear agenda, well organized meeting. People are genuinely willing to help each other. I can see great ideas forming and real collaborations happening. ” - Jing


PS. Remember to bring your own name tag this will help brand your organization more effectively.

Sponsors of the event:

The Nonprofit Career Coach a division of Jobs In Nonprofits (http://www.thenonprof...) and Vlora Restaurant (www.vloraboston.com)
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a name tag - Bring your own name tag please!

group.name: Social Impact Success Community Meetup Group

item.name: Social Impact Circle Meetup Group Monthly Meetup
